dmca.title: [EV1-C1548356Y] Copyright infringement by your customer
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 6:54 AM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: [EV1-C1548356Y] Copyright infringement by your customer
Subject: [EV1-C1548356Y] Copyright infringement by your customer


==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright infringement by your customer Added by system at Friday,
Oct 27 2006 10:11 am
X-MailFrom: nick@x-rm.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [207.218.192.58] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Fri Oct 27 07:33:25 2006
Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net
  (SMTP32) id A00000738; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 07:32:14 -0500
Received: from mx03.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.229] by
mail.ev1.net with ESMTP
  (SMTPD32-6.06) id AC4A2740013C; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 07:32:13 -0500
Return-path: <nick@x-rm.com>
Delivery-date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 07:33:19 -0500
Received: from neon.staging.x-rm.com ([195.166.37.20]
helo=mail.x-rm.com)  by mx03.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
nick@x-rm.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:RC4-MD5:128)
 (Exim)
 id 1GdQti-000Imr-8i; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 07:33:18 -0500
Received: from [192.168.0.89] by x-rm.com
 (MDaemon.PRO.v8.1.4.R)
 with ESMTP id md50000464731.msg; 
        Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:33:10 +0100
Message-ID: <4541FC84.8070607@x-rm.com>
Date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:33:08 +0100
From: Nick Gilbert <nick@x-rm.com>
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.7 (Windows/20060909)
MIME-Version: 1.0
To:  abuse@ev1.net,  support@ev1.net
Subject: Copyright infringement by your customer
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Authenticated-Sender: nick@x-rm.com
X-HashCash: 1:20:061027:abuse@ev1.net::gyoMqC5S/TIFDqne:00001Y1I
X-Spam-Processed: mail.x-rm.com, Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:33:10 +0100 
        (not processed: message from trusted or authenticated source)
X-Return-Path: nick@x-rm.com
X-Declude-Sender: nick@x-rm.com [207.218.221.229]
X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0]
X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx03.filter.theplanet.com
([207.218.221.229]). 

MIME element (text/plain)
Hi, 
 
One of your customers (www.jeytech.com) has committed gross copyright
theft of our entire website (nearly all pages) and is passing it off as
their own. They are infringing our trademarks and are advertising our
products as their own. 
 
Can you please cease and desist from hosting this website immediately as
it is illegal for you to host this copyrighted content without our
consent. 
 
Our site  : http://www.x-rm.com
Their site: http://www.jeytech.com 
 
Internet archive sites will show that all the pages, content and
graphics have been in use by us since September 2004. 
 
Their site even mentions our company's name (X-RM) on a page where they
have obviously forgotten to change it: 
        http://www.jeytech.com/FacilitiesManagement.htm 
        (under paragraph "ASP and Installed Solutions") 
 
Please acknowledge receipt of this message. 
 
Thanks, 
 
Nick Gilbert
X-RM Limited
http://www.x-rm.com/
